title: Possible idea for the future of league..
body:
ok so i've been thinking for a while " i love league and all in it but.. " but i feel like when league constantly brings new champs its for the hype up to keep everyone interested and honestly thats fine, but i couldn't help but think every time i see the beautiful landscape and and sketches and artwork of riot that.. it could be a really good mmo, like WOW   you have races, sides to choose from, a full world, champions who are somewhat heroes to the people of runeterra, every harrowing of every World of Legends ( its just for this discussion ) you could have a harrowing event .. you have created a whole world of mass story line and beautiful areas of land, it could be a really successful investment, and when you think its time to add something new to league it could be new to WOL, you could even add new worlds, i personally would play the absolute shit out of it, its honestly food for thought but i know my friends and i would love an open world quest like game of league. 
Peace{{summoner:12}}

replies.body: This is an amazing idea, Like each champion is its own class
and not exactly i mean like the races, yordles, humans, void creatures, freljordians, shurimans so on

no definetly not change league, i mean like how world of warcraft was just warcraft then they made the mmo version, i ithink league should do a world like that, it would honestly have so many cool features

What you are suggesting is changing league into a whole new game completely... maybe it might be a good idea for a spin off game?

However, I like your idea of new maps. A new league map or just more rotating game modes could be super cool and get everyone hyped for season 7.
